body: Thanks for replying, Mostapha, are you implying that the results from the Ladybug Radiation Analysis component aren't accurate? I'm not sure how to set up solar radiation analysis with Honeybee - here's what I have so far (attached screenshot). Can you tell me which components I'm missing? Thank you.
